item.title: Welcome My Shiny New Blog, backed by Sandra Snow
item.description: Well well well, it seems as though I have finally found the motivation for migrate my blog off of blogger and in theory...start writing a bit again. This blog is now running on Sandra.Snow, which is hot off the presses from @philliphaydon and @jchannon. It's basically a Jekyll port to .NET running on NancyFx (https://github.com/NancyFx/Nancy) ; I'm hosting on GitHub Pages, but you can go the Azure route too.
